Key Match Events: Khvicha Kvaratskhelia scored Georgia's opening goal after only 93 seconds.
Georges Mikautadze scored a penalty in the 57th minute to secure Georgia's 2-0 victory.
Cristiano Ronaldo received a yellow card for protesting after his penalty appeal was turned down.
Georgia's goalkeeper Giorgi Mamardashvili made crucial saves to maintain the two-goal lead.
Pre-Game Insights: Khvicha Kvaratskhelia was inspired by a pre-game chat with Cristiano Ronaldo.
Post-Match Reflections: Khvicha Kvaratskhelia described the win as the best day of his life, surpassing his club's historic Italian title.
Portugal coach Roberto Martinez criticized the 'very inconsistent' video reviews but denied underestimating Georgia.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Georgia advanced to the last 16 at Euro 2024 as one of the best third-place teams.
Portugal had already qualified from Group F after winning its first two games.
Georgia's victory eliminated Hungary from the tournament.
